content:
The file /workspace/requests/requests/sessions.py has been edited. Here's the result of running `cat -n` on a snippet of /workspace/requests/requests/sessions.py:
   425	            If Tuple, ('cert', 'key') pair.
   426	        """
   427	
   428	        # Ensure the HTTP method is a native string. Using builtin_str
   429	        # will call str() on bytes in Python 3 which produces the
   430	        # "b'GET'" representation. Use to_native_string which will

Review the changes and make sure they are as expected. Edit the file again if necessary.

extras.new_content:
# Ensure the HTTP method is a native string. Using builtin_str
        # will call str() on bytes in Python 3 which produces the
        # "b'GET'" representation. Use to_native_string which will
        # decode bytes to a str on Python 3 and otherwise return the
        # native string type.
        method = to_native_string(method)
extras.diff:
--- /workspace/requests/requests/sessions.py
+++ /workspace/requests/requests/sessions.py
@@ -428 +428,6 @@
-        method = builtin_str(method)
+        # Ensure the HTTP method is a native string. Using builtin_str
+        # will call str() on bytes in Python 3 which produces the
+        # "b'GET'" representation. Use to_native_string which will
+        # decode bytes to a str on Python 3 and otherwise return the
+        # native string type.
+        method = to_native_string(method)
